Utility.name: qlListEnum
Utility.description: return the members of a given enumeration

Parameter.name: enumId
Parameter.description: name of the enum to list

ReturnValue.description: list of the members of the specified enumeration

Utility.name: qlListRegisteredEnums
Utility.description: return the names of all registered enums

ReturnValue.description: list of names of registered enums

Utility.name: qlListRegisteredTypes
Utility.description: return the names of all registered complex types

ReturnValue.description: list of names of registered enums

Utility.name: qlListType
Utility.description: return the members of a given complex type

Parameter.name: typeId
Parameter.description: name of the complex type to list

ReturnValue.description: list of the members of the specified enumeration

Utility.name: qlVersion
Utility.description: returns the version number of QuantLib
